driver-dnf: For each driver predict the if they will DNF (did not finish) a race in the next 1 month.
driver-top3: For each driver predict the top 3 teams they will drive for in the next 1 month.
driver-position: For each driver predict the position they will finish in the next 1 month.
user-repeat: Predict whether a user will attend an event(by responding yes or maybe) in the next 7 days if they have already attended an event in the last 14 days.
user-ignore: Predict whether a user will ignore more than 2 event invitations in the next 7 days
user-attendance: Predict how many events each user will respond yes or maybe in the next seven days.
user-clicks: Predict whether each customer will click on more than one Ads in the next 4 days.
user-visits: Predict whether each customer will visit more than one Ad in the next 4 days.
ad-ctr: Assuming the Ad will be clicked in the next 4 days, predict the Click-Through-Rate (CTR) for each Ad.
user-ad-visit: Predict the list of ads a user will visit in the next 4 days.
post-post-related: Predict a list of existing posts that users will link a given post to in the next two years.
study-outcome: Predict if the trials will achieve its primary outcome (defined as p-value < 0.05).
